All,

  I have a set of test cases.  After all of these test cases, I need =
to verify that a particular condition is true.  My understanding is that te=
arDown should not be used to assert anything, because, among other reasons,=
 if your test case had an assertion failure, it would/could be masked by an=
 assertion failure in tearDown.  However, aside from manually adding calls =
at the end of each and every one of my tests (which is obviously redundant =
and error prone and as such unacceptable), how can I assert something after=
 each test is run?

Thanks
